H0.text: Light energy is the kind of energy that all moving objects have.

H1.text: Solar energy is the kind of energy that all moving objects have.

H2.text: Kinetic energy is the kind of energy that all moving objects possess.

H3.text: Renewable energy is the kind of energy that all moving objects have.

A4.text: In physics, the kinetic energy of an object is the form of energy that it possesses due to its motion.

A5.text: Kinetic energy is the movement energy of an object.
